lookup.use: Check if a system exists in EDSM

locate.use: Check if a CMDR exists and shares their location in EDSM

distance.use: Check the distance between two points in EDSM

landmark.use: Check if a given point is nearby a given Landmark System

dssa.use: Check for the closest DSSA carrier to a given location.

mancase.use: Used to start a new Manual Seal Case by Dispatchers. Drillled Seals Only, and run in a channel.

manfish.use: Used to start a new Manual Kingfisher Case by Dispatchers. Drillled Seals Only, and run in a channel.

tsping.use: Used to ping the Trained Seal role in the Seal discord. Drillled Seals Only, and run in a channel.

ping.use: Check to see if the bot is responding to commands.

utc.use: Check for the current In Game Time and Date

year.use: Check for the current In Game Year

whois.use: Check the user information for registered name. Must be a registered user, and run in DMs with HalpyBOT.

whoami.use: Check the user information on yourself. Must be a registered user, and run in DMs with HalpyBOT.

forcejoin.use: Force a user to join an allowed channel in IRC. Drilled Seals Only, must be run in a channel.

delaystatus.use: Checks the system for Delayed Cases

delaycase.use: Adds a new case to the Delayed system, and responds with a unique Case ID.

updatestatus.use: Updates the Status Code of a case - see the table of different status codes below!

updatenotes.use: Updates the Notes attached to a case - this replaces the old notes entirely, so be sure to be complete in your new notes!

updatecase.use: Updates both the Status Code and Notes of a case - this replaces the old notes entirely, so be sure to be complete in your new notes!

close.use: Closes a case and removes it from the Delayed Case system. It's encouraged to update the notes before you close a case!

reopen.use: Reopens a previously-closed case, if a case is improperly closed. Moderator only
